medium: Earthenware with white slip and traces of pigment
title: Horse from Set of Zodiac Figures
description: Zodiacal figure in form of man with head of horse.  Representing God of the Constellation Hsing.  Grey earthenware with white ground.  Painted with flesh-coloured pigments; Taoist symbol for the principle \'The Creative; Heaven\' (Ch\'ien =) see cat. card for better description.
